name: Radon Interventions in Public and Assisted Multifamily Housing
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Office of Lead Hazard Control and Healthy Homes
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Housing and Urban Development Act of 1970, Sections 501-502, 12 U.S.C. 1701z-1-z-2.

rules_regulations: The Notice of Funding Opportunity and Application files  are self-contained; all necessary information is provided at http://www.hud.gov/Grants; no other regulations pertain.
